channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: 1 dead as Florida authorities declare a ‘mass casualty’ in boat crash near Clearwater bridge
item.description: One person has died and at least a dozen people were injured in Florida when a boat crashed into a ferry and then fled the scene off the Memorial Causeway Bridge.

item.title: Former Memphis officers to face second trial in beating death of Tyre Nichols
What to know about the trial of an ex-Michigan officer charged in the killing of a Black motorist
